metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20397 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A double-free is present in libyang before v1.0-r1 in the functionyyparse() when an organization field is not terminated. Applications thatuse libyang to parse untrusted input yang files may be vulnerable to thisflaw, which would cause a crash or potentially code execution.

criterions.comment: libyang package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
